about_the_game:
Weed County Gold Edition is the fully remastered version of the game built in an entirely new engine. The replacement of the physics engine gives it a larger performance boost.   

FEATURES

  • New Furniture Movement Mode: Furnish your home by click and dropping your furniture wherever you want with the right mouse button. Rotate furniture with the "Z" key.

  • New Visuals: New ground textures, foliage, and rocks improve the game's look and existing style.

  • New UI adjustments: The UI has been changed to make it look better and have lower opacity so things behind it are more visible.

  • New Distributer: When you earn enough respect, go to the airport and meet up with Jerry who will make some offers you can't refuse.

  • New Dialog Art: Get a better look at the person you're talking to. Everyone has gotten dialog art to better immerse you in the world.

New Engine: Rebuilt from the ground up without the physics engine.

NOTICE

Weed County Gold Edition is a completely different version than the original game. Since it has its own .exe file, Gold Edition can be chosen to play when normally launching Weed County. Also, saves are not compatible between Gold Edition and the original game because they use two separate engines.

content_descriptors.notes: Weed County Gold Edition contains drug use, illegal drug sales, mild violence, and mild sexual content.

short_description: Weed County Gold Edition is the fully remastered version of the game built in an entirely new engine. Includes new visuals, content, and enhancements.
